turns.content: Hello? Who is this?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from out of state and something urgent has come up. Can you hear me okay?

Oh, hello thereI'm sorry, who is this again? My hearing isn't the best these days.
(I'm Walter.) Do I know you from somewhere?
It's Mike, your grandson! From Florida. Don't tell Grandma that we're arguing about taxes and she suggested calling someone for help but it turned out to be a scam. Can you believe it?
Oh right, Mike! How are you? What's up with the taxes? Is everything okay?
Well, I need some quick money transferred over or else there will be serious consequences on my account. But don't worry, once this is sorted I'll be able to visit soon!
That sounds stressful. Listen, why don't we talk about this when I can sit down and maybe speak with your grandma too? We should probably figure out the best way to do this.
Sure thing Grandpa, but honestly it's urgent and if you could just send some money over to this addressYou know how much I respect you. Just a small loan until next month!
I understand it's stressful for you, son. But maybe we can arrange something properly through the bank or at least talk it over with Grandma first?
Please Grandpa, it means everything right now. Can't you trust me?

Grandpa, this is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS here. We've been trying to reach your grandson Mike for unpaid taxes and he's asked us to speak directly with you. This needs immediate attention or there will be severe legal consequences including arrest if we can't resolve this issue right away.
Do you understand the seriousness of this situation? Your grandson has a fine that needs to be paid immediately in order to avoid further penalties. Have you been contacted by anyone about this before?
We need the payment as soon as possible, preferably within the hour via gift cards or prepaid cards like Visa or Mastercard. Can you provide us with the card numbers and PINs for these cards right away so we can process this quickly?
Can you tell me your grandson's full name, please? And could you read back to me the amount of the fine which is $4850?
I need that information now in order to resolve this issue. Please act fast because if not resolved within the hour, Mike will be arrested.
Are there any questions you have for us or anyone else before we proceed with gathering those prepaid card details? We're here to help you and your grandson avoid legal trouble.
Please hurry Grandpa, this is very important!

Oh my, I see. Agent Mitchell, thank you for calling but let me check with Mike's mother first. She usually handles these kinds of issues when they come up with him. Can we maybe call her together or something?
Wait just a moment while I confirm everything okay? Maybe she has more info and can guide us on what to do properly.
I appreciate your concern, really I do. But let me talk this through better before moving forward-don't want any mistakes or regrets later.
Can you hold on for just one minute? I'll get back with you once I've spoken with her about it all first.
Of course, Agent Mitchell. No need to worry though; we'll take care of it right away after speaking with Mike's mom to make sure everything is understood correctly.
Thank you so much for your patience. We won't do anything until we're certain and clear on the next steps.
Hold on a moment while I ask her about this, okay?

Grandpa, there's no time to waste here. This isn't something that can wait or be confirmed with anyone else. The IRS takes these matters very seriously and immediate action is required to avoid severe penalties for your grandson. We're already behind schedule and every minute counts.
If you need to speak with someone else first, it could jeopardize any chance of resolving this without further complications. Can't we just focus on getting the necessary funds together now?
Please understand that we're here to assist you in helping your grandson avoid legal trouble. We only have a short window to address this issue before it escalates.
Can you commit to providing us with the prepaid card details within the next 30 minutes? It's crucial for both of your sakes that this is settled now.
Trust me, Grandpa, this isn't something for tomorrow or even today later. We need to act right away to protect Mike from serious consequences.
Please consider our request seriously and provide us with the card numbers so we can move forward immediately.
We're here to help you navigate through this urgent matter. Let's not delay any further if we want to avoid arrest for your grandson.
Can you assist us now, Grandpa? Time is of the essence here.

Agent Mitchell, I understand how pressing this seems but let me just confirm with his mother first. She has dealt with these kinds of issues before and will have clearer instructions on what we should do properly to avoid any trouble.
I promise to get back as soon as possible so we can proceed without delay once everything is settled with her confirmation.
Can you give us a bit more time for this, please? I know it's urgent but verifying first ensures there won't be any complications down the line.
Thank you for your understanding and patience in this matter. We'll resolve it swiftly after getting proper guidance from Mike's mother.
Please hold on while I make that call now to ensure we're taking the right steps forward.
Hold on just one moment, Agent Mitchell. I need to speak with his mother briefly before proceeding further, okay?

Grandpa, I understand your concern about speaking with someone else first, but the IRS protocol doesn't allow for delays or confirmations from external parties once we've initiated contact regarding an outstanding fine. We have a strict timeline and every minute counts.
If there's any doubt in your mind about this process, it could very well lead to serious legal consequences for Mike right now. Can you please prioritize resolving this matter by providing the necessary prepaid card details immediately?
We're here to assist you in protecting your grandson from further penalties. The quicker we resolve this, the better chance we have of avoiding arrest and related issues.
Please provide us with the required information so we can proceed swiftly and ensure everything is settled as quickly as possible.
Can you commit to providing the prepaid card details now, Grandpa? It's crucial for both your sakes that this is handled immediately.

Agent Mitchell, I really appreciate how urgent this seems but let me just confirm with his mother one more time before proceeding. She'll be able to give us clear instructions and we won't have any doubts going forward.
I promise once she confirms everything, I will take immediate action as requested without delay.
